meaningMnemonic: Something that's <kanji>valuable</kanji> and <kanji>heavy</kanji> is extremely <vocabulary>precious</vocabulary> and probably even more <vocabulary>valuable</vocabulary> than your less heavy things.
readingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You didn't learn this reading for 重 though, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

Keep things <vocabulary>precious</vocabulary> to you very close, because the evil Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (ちょう) will come and steal it away if you don't. She'll take every <vocabulary>valuable</vocabulary> you have and destroy them.
